title: Easter Date Calculation
description:
EASTER calculates for a given year, the date of Easter Sun￾day. Most religious holidays have a fxed distance from Easter, so that in
the case that Easter is known for a year, these holidays can also be deter￾mined easily. EASTER is also used in the module HOLIDAY to calculate holi￾days.
name: EASTER

input.name: year
input.description: The year for which the Easter date should be calculated, provided as an integer.

output.name: EASTER
output.description: The calculated date of Easter Sunday for the specified year.

return_value.description: The calculated date of Easter Sunday for the year input.
